neighbors.name: John David Macintyre
neighbors.claims: John D. Macintyre is listed as the owner of two McHenry County parcels (PIN 11-32-100-018 and 11-32-100-020) located in Marengo Township ([McHenry County Property Tax Inquiry](https://mchenryil.devnetwedge.com)). No public comments or letters from Macintyre about local development were found in county records or media reports ([McHenry Times](https://mchenrytimes.com/stories/617799713-mchenry-county-zoning-board-of-appeals-met-oct-28)). He does not hold any known local public office or board positions as of 2024 ([McHenry County Government Directory](https://www.mchenrycountyil.gov/county-government/county-yearbook/political-parties)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage through a trusted local farming contact for an informal conversation, listening to any land-use or property concerns he may have and emphasizing respect for his long-term interests.
